app.title: PWA Skeleton
home.title: Home
home.description: This is the default home screen of PWA Skeleton v1.
notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Here notifications and alerts will be shown in the future.
settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage the basic settings of the app here.
settings.global.description: Manage the basic settings of the app here.
settings.modules.title: Module settings
settings.modules.empty: No modules with their own settings available.
settings.modules.unavailable: There are currently no settings available for this module.
settings.theme.title: Theme
settings.theme.description: Choose whether the app theme follows the system or is fixed to Light/Dark.
settings.language.title: Language
settings.telemetry.title: Diagnostics & Telemetry
settings.telemetry.description: Control whether anonymous usage and error data are sent.
settings.pipelineDemo.title: Data & Pipeline Demo
settings.pipelineDemo.description: Start a demo pipeline job that loads and transforms data.
settings.aiDemo.title: AI Summary (Demo)
settings.aiDemo.description: Enter text to get a short demo summary.
validation.maxLength: The text is too long. Please shorten it.
home.module.notes.title: Quick Notes
home.module.notes.description: Capture short thoughts or to-dos directly from the home screen.
desktopBlock.title: Mobile app available
desktopBlock.description: This PWA is primarily designed for use on smartphones. Scan the QR code to open it on your device.
desktopBlock.step1: 1. Open the camera app on your smartphone.
desktopBlock.step4: 4. Add the app to your home screen to use it like a native app.
desktopBlock.qr.label: QR code to open the app
notes.title: Quick Notes
notes.description: Save short thoughts, to-dos, and ideas so you don't forget them.
modules.notes.settings.title: Notes settings
modules.notes.settings.description: Adjust the behavior of the notes feature.
modules.notes.settings.defaultTitlePlace: Optional default title for new notes
errorBoundary.title: An error occurred.
errorBoundary.message: Something went wrong. You can try again.
core.offline.title: You are offline
core.offline.body: No internet connection. The app only works in a limited way. Please try again when you are back online.
modules.dreamdropDemo.title: Dreamdrop Demo
modules.dreamdropDemo.description: Capture dreams and let AI summarize them with mood context.
modules.dreamdropDemo.output.aiDisabled: AI summarization is disabled in settings.
modules.dreamdropDemo.output.noSummary: No summary yet. Save a dream and run AI to see results.
modules.dreamdropDemo.settings.title: Dreamdrop settings
modules.dreamdropDemo.settings.descripti: Toggle AI summarization preferences for Dreamdrop.
modules.riskRadarDemo.title: RiskRadar Demo
modules.riskRadarDemo.description: Run a mock risk pipeline and inspect scores.
modules.riskRadarDemo.list.empty: No assets match the current filters.
modules.riskRadarDemo.list.header.name: Asset
modules.riskRadarDemo.settings.title: RiskRadar settings
modules.riskRadarDemo.settings.descripti: Configure default thresholds for the risk demo.
